name.en: diy starter kit for Arduino steel grey/black 88 pcs
name.de: diy starter kit für Arduino stahlgrau/schwarz 88 Stück

description.nl:
Whadda diy-starterkit voor Arduino

Do it yourself starterkit van Whadda, geschikt voor Arduino. De set bestaat uit 88 maar liefst onderdelen. 

Specificaties:
Kleur: grijs, zwart, blauw
Geslacht: unisex
Materiaal: kunststof, staal

Inhoud:
1 x WPB100: ATmega328 ONTWIKKELBORD
15 x LED (meerdere kleuren)
8 x 220 Ohm resistor (RA220E0)
5 x 1K resistor (RA1K0)
5 x 10K resistor (RA10K0)
1 x 830 hole breadboard
1 x RGB LED module ( WPM318: RGB SMD LED-module 3 kleuren (2 st.) )
4 x 4-pin key switch
1 x active buzzer ( WPM319: actieve buzzermodule (2 st.) )
1 x 1838 IR infrared 37.9 Khz receiver ( WPI317: 1838 IR-ontvanger 37.9 kHz (2 st.) )
1 x infrared remote control
1 x infrared sensor diode
2 Ball tilt switch (similar to MERS4 & MERS5)
1 x 74HC595 shift register (HC595)
1 Batterijhouder voor 6 AA batterijen (gelijk aan BH363B)
1 x 8*8 LED matrix display
1 Single digit 7 segment LED display
1 x 4 digit 7 segment LED display
30 Breadboard jumper kabels
1 Potmeter 50K
1 Passieve buzzer
1 Temperatuursensor LM35 (LM35DZ)
3 Lichtgevoelige transistor (SGPT5053C)
1 USB-kabel
description.en:
Whadda diy-starterkit for Arduino

Do it yourself starterkit from Whadda, suitable for Arduino. The kit consists of 88 parts

Specifications:
Colour: grey, black, blue
Gender: unisex
Material: plastic, steel

Contents:
1 x WPB100: ATmega328 DEVELOPMENT BOARD
15 x LED (multiple colors)
8 x 220 Ohm resistor (RA220E0)
5 x 1K resistor (RA1K0)
5 x 10K resistor (RA10K0)
1 x 830 hole breadboard
1 x RGB LED module ( WPM318: RGB SMD LED module 3 colors (2 pcs) )
4 x 4-pin key switch
1 x active buzzer ( WPM319: active buzzer module (2 pcs.) )
1 x 1838 IR infrared 37.9 Khz receiver ( WPI317: 1838 IR receiver 37.9 kHz (2 pcs.) )
1 x infrared remote control
1 x infrared sensor diode
2 Ball tilt switch (similar to MERS4 & MERS5)
1 x 74HC595 shift register (HC595)
1 Battery holder for 6 AA batteries (similar to BH363B)
1 x 8*8 LED matrix display
1 Single digit 7 segment LED display
1 x 4 digit 7 segment LED display
30 Breadboard jumper cables
1 Potentiometer 50K
1 Passive buzzer
1 Temperature sensor LM35 (LM35DZ)
3 Light sensitive transistor (SGPT5053C)
1 USB cable
description.de:
Whadda diy-starterkit für Arduino

Do-it-yourself-Starterkit von Whadda, geeignet für Arduino. Der Bausatz besteht aus 88 Teilen

Spezifikationen:
Farbe: grau, schwarz, blau
Geschlecht: unisex
Material: Kunststoff, Stahl

Inhalt:
1 x WPB100: ATmega328 DEVELOPMENT BOARD
15 x LED (mehrere Farben)
8 x 220-Ohm-Widerstand (RA220E0)
5 x 1K-Widerstand (RA1K0)
5 x 10K-Widerstand (RA10K0)
1 x 830er Lochrasterplatte
1 x RGB LED-Modul ( WPM318: RGB SMD LED-Modul 3 Farben (2 Stück) )
4 x 4-poliger Schlüsselschalter
1 x aktiver Summer ( WPM319: aktives Buzzer-Modul (2 Stück) )
1 x 1838 IR-Infrarot-Empfänger 37,9 Khz ( WPI317: 1838 IR-Empfänger 37,9 kHz (2 Stck.) )
1 x Infrarot-Fernbedienung
1 x Infrarot-Sensor-Diode
2 Kugelkippschalter (ähnlich MERS4 & MERS5)
1 x 74HC595 Schieberegister
1 Batteriehalter für 6 AA-Batterien (ähnlich BH363B)
1 x 8*8 LED-Matrix-Anzeige
1 Einstellige 7-Segment-LED-Anzeige
1 x 4-stellige 7-Segment-LED-Anzeige
30 Überbrückungskabel für das Breadboard
1 Potentiometer 50K
1 Passiver Summer
1 Temperatursensor LM35 (LM35DZ)
3 Lichtempfindlicher Transistor (SGPT5053C)
1 USB-Kabel
